column7: a pair of bag snatchers were beaten up by a crowd of by-standers who witnessed them snatching a bag from a foreign couple on street 172.------After the suspects snatched a bag from two foreigners
column9: passers-by grabbed one of the suspects and administered some street justice before police arrived.------After the police took the first suspect to the station
column10: the crowd then caught up with the other suspect and gave him a good hiding too
column11: before taking him to police at Psar Thmei 1 station.------https://tvfb.news/article/14914
